graphql.query:
mutation ($payload:BusinessPartnerPortalCreateSalesInvoiceHeaderInput!)
{
	businessPartnerPortalCreateSalesInvoiceHeader (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		rowId
		invoiceNumber
		externalId
		externalSystemCode
		businessPartnerId
		invoiceDate
		dueDate
		status
		subtotal
		taxAmount
		discountAmount
		totalAmount
		paidAmount
		currencyCode
		paymentTermDays
		notes
		customerNotes
	}
}

		updatedAt

}
